ygData.subject: Digging the pod
ygData.msgSnippet: After some minutes of firing, Blackfang detected that he and Hot Rod were getting close to the pod. Blackfang: Hot Rod, stop firing. Any more and we might

After some minutes of firing, Blackfang detected that he and Hot Rod 
were getting close to the pod.

Blackfang: Hot Rod, stop firing. Any more and we might damage it. 
Let's handle the rest by hand.

He took out his bone knife from its shoulder holster and got in the 
hole they had blasted. He started to scratch with the surprisingly 
durable blade and soon saw the top of the pod.

Blackfang: That's it! Hey Hot Rod, want to take my halberd and give me 
a hand?
